title: Quizzer
description: The quizzer is an app you can play quizzes with. The team, the scoreboard and the host all have their own SPA.
stack: MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js, ws, Sass

title: Rekenlogboek
description: The rekenlogboek is an app that helps teachers to keep track of the progress students make with maths.
stack: MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js, Socket.io, Sass

title: Eenmaal Andermaal
description: Eenmaal Andermaal is an auction website. People can search for auctions in a lot of different categories and make a bid.

title: Fruitcatcher
description: Fruitcatcher is a game in which the player has to catch falling fruit and dodge other falling objects.
